hero.title: አጋር Assistant
hero.subtitle: Empower Your Academic Journey with Agar Student Assistant

features.sectionTitle: Join Agar Assistant and get access to all features
features.sectionDescription: Our web app provides a comprehensive solution for students by seamlessly integrating score tracking and task management features. With our app, students can easily stay organized and focused, ensuring they stay on top of their academic progress.

items.title: Score Tracking
items.desc: Effortlessly keep track of your test scores and grades for various subjects. This feature allows you to visualize your progress over time, identify areas for improvement, and set goals to boost your academic performance.

items.title: Task Management
items.desc: Streamline your academic workflow with our intuitive task management system. Create to-do lists, set due dates, and prioritize tasks, helping you effectively manage assignments, projects, and study sessions.

items.title: Calendar Integration
items.desc: Sync your academic schedule with our app's calendar feature. Save important dates, such as exam dates, project deadlines, and class schedules, ensuring you never miss a commitment and allowing you to plan your tasks effectively.
